overview:
Lamelza, a graduate of Evangel University is best known as the former CEO of Team Media, which started in 1995 as a small web services company and by 2001 was one of the fastest growing web services companies in the United States. Lamelza has gone on to form other companies and continues to provide leadership as an active board member to those entities.

With global experience in online marketing, SAAS (Software as a Service), distributed networks, mobile networks, and software development he is a vetted professional in deploying large environment technology with a marketing focus. Lamelza was inducted into the International Academy of the Visual and has also been recognized by the Business Journal as one of Missouriâ€™s top 40 under 40 young professionals.

An active member of SEMPO (Search Engine Marketing Professional Organization) and part of the national Speakers Bureau, Lamelza is a highly sought after expert and speaker with respect to the convergence of marketing and technology. His broad expertise in entertainment, government, education, fashion, mobile netowrks, and retail provides continued results to companies seeking to position themselves with next generation of new media.
